summary: A runaway criminal breaks into an eerie chateau, taking its two frightened chambermaids hostage. As night falls, a group of mysterious aristocratic women arrive and the criminal begins to realize the women are hiding a sinister secret.
cast: Franca Maï|Brigitte Lahaie|Jean-Marie Lemaire|Fanny Magier|Muriel Montossé|Sophie Noël|Evelyne Thomas|Joe de Palmer|Cyril Val|Myriam Watteau|Agnès Bert|Jacques Sansoul|Jacques Marbeuf
title: El castillo de las vampiras
